data.actual_result: The keybind changes to "Ctrl+UNK3" and you cannot use that keybind (your friends do not hear you speaking and your icon doesn't light up).
data.expected_result: Ctrl+Scr LK is set as your keybind and you are able to speak in the voice channel using that keybind.
data.short_description: Using "ctrl+scrn lk" key will change to Ctrl+ UNK3 and you won't be able to use the keybind.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open User Settings - Open Keybinds - Click "Add a Keybind - Select PTT - Record Keybind - Press "Ctrl" (either left or right) and "SCR LK" keys on your keyboard - Click Stop Recording - ESC to a server voice channel - Join voice channel - Press the PTT keybind.
